chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (xs bs : list A), ExistsL A P bs -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs)

Premises:
ExistsL : forall A : Type, Pred A -> list A -> Type
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Pred = fun A : Type => A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
SearchE : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
FoundE : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), P a -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
ExistsL_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
Refl.make_conj_cons : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (a : A) (l : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (a :: l) < -> eval a /\ Refl.make_conj eval l
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
fold_right_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l l' : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (l ++ l') = fold_right f (fold_right f i l') l
Refl.make_conj_rapp : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (rev_append l1 l2) < -> Refl.make_conj eval (l1 ++ l2)
map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : list A), map f (l ++ l') = map f l ++ map f l'
Refl.make_conj_app : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (l1 ++ l2) < -> Refl.make_conj eval l1 /\ Refl.make_conj eval l2
existsb_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l1 l2 : list A), existsb f (l1 ++ l2) = (existsb f l1 || existsb f l2)%bool
forallb_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l1 l2 : list A), forallb f (l1 ++ l2) = (forallb f l1 && forallb f l2)%bool
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
Refl.not_make_conj_app : forall (A : Type) (t a : list A) (eval : A -> Prop), (forall d : A, eval d \/ ~ eval d) -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval (t ++ a) < -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval t \/ ~ Refl.make_conj eval a
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope
fold_right : forall A B : Type, (B -> A -> A) -> A -> list B -> A
Refl.not_make_conj_cons : forall (A : Type) (t : A) (a : list A) (eval : A -> Prop), eval t \/ ~ eval t -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval (t :: a) < -> ~ eval t \/ ~ Refl.make_conj eval a
NoDup_remove_1 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l')
concat : forall A : Type, list (list A) -> list A
NoDup_remove_2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> ~ In a (l ++ l')
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Inductive clos_refl (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := r_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x y | r_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x x Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_refl _%type_scope
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)

intros A P xs bs H.
induction H.
- apply FoundE.
- apply SearchE. apply IHExistsL.
